meanings.definition: most dowdy or unfashionable in appearance
meanings.sent1: She wore the frumpiest dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The librarian always dressed in the frumpiest outfits.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked at her with surprise in the frumpiest dress.
meanings.sent4: Her style was so frumpiest, it was like a blast from the past.
meanings.sent5: The frumpiest outfit she wore made her stand out for all the wrong reasons.

meanings.definition: in a dowdy or unfashionable manner
meanings.sent1: She walked frumpiest into the room, drawing curious glances.
meanings.sent2: The old man dressed frumpiest at the fancy gala.
meanings.sent3: He danced frumpiest at the party, but everyone enjoyed his enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The music played frumpiest, setting a relaxed mood for the evening.
meanings.sent5: The clouds moved frumpiest across the sky, signaling an impending storm.

meanings.definition: the state of being dowdy or unfashionable
meanings.sent1: Despite her efforts, she couldn't escape the frumpiest of her wardrobe.
meanings.sent2: The frumpiest of the fashion industry was on display at the event.
meanings.sent3: In a world of glamour, he found comfort in the frumpiest of styles.
meanings.sent4: The town's reputation for being frumpiest was hard to shake off.
meanings.sent5: She embraced the frumpiest of trends, standing out in a sea of elegance.
